page.title: 01Norton and Billingham
page.content: This area contrasts the old with the new. There are two old villages, Norton and Billingham, and many new developments. Norton especially still looks like a small village with a church overlooking a village green complete with duck pond. Contrasting this is the new town centre of Billingham with modern buildings and The Forum, a large sports centre. Most of the area has been developed. There is a large industrial concern, ICI, and only a few small farms and a golf course. Running through the area is the A19, a major north - south road link serving the needs of the area. This is an area of contrast - the old and the new - the industrial and the rural.
